divs: Sighting Detailssilent black triangle of moving from from the left side of the sky to the right side of the sky. I observrd triangle as I was walking to the car to go to the store september 28 2013 I observed object with a friend who also saw the same exact object and it just disappeared when it first appeared that it had made a change in its direction but went sideways and became invisible
Summary: silent black triangle without lights in Long Beach
